dmca.title: Thai food site stirred up over claimed copying
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notifications accompanying this letter is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed and I have authorized [private] to act for me in this matter.

Sincerely,
 
[private]
Thai Food and Travel dot com Phone: [private]
Fax: n/a
Email: [private]@earthiink.net
 


Dear Sir or Madam,

I have am filing DMCA complaints for 13 webpages found on the www.dinininginthailand.com website. I have included an individual page for each violating page and a letter from my wife, [private], whose copyright has been infringed, authorizing me to act for her in this matter.

For the most part, the text that has been stolen appeared originally in one of two cookbooks published in 1995 and 2000. I would be happy to provide photocopies of the specific pages and/or URLs for historical versions of the pages from archive.org

Sincerely,
[private],
President Thai Food and Travel dot com 
Phone: [private]
Fax: n/a
Email: [private]@earthlink.net
 


Dear Sir or Madam,

1.		The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.thaifoodandtravel.com/ingredients/shallot.html

2.		Search Query: shallots hawm daeng
	 Infringing Web Pages: http://www.dininginthailand.com/ingredl5-shallots.htm

3.		My Contact Information: [private]@earthlink.net

4.		Infringer's Contact Information:
DININGINTHAILAND.COM
Management US = [private]
[private]@asia.com
Online Contact page found here:
http://www.dininginthailand.com/contactus.htm

5.		I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.		I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,[private], President Thai Food and Travel dot corn Phone: [private]
Fax: n/a
Email: [private]@earthlink.net
 

Dear Sir or Madam,
